title: Fed Faces Tough Decisions as Inflation Lingers and Economic Risks Loom
description: The central bank is expected to raise rates three-quarters of a point today, but what it says about its next steps will be even more important.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek
media:description: Jerome H. Powell, the Federal Reserve chair, and his colleagues have been rapidly increasing interest rates this year to try to wrestle inflation lower.
